(I'M BACK PEOPLES!!!!!!  I'M BAAAAAAACCK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I KNOW THAT YOU AL=
LLLLL PROBABLY WONDERED WHERE I WAS, WELL, I WAS SUFFERING FROM A BUSTED CO=
MPUTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  BUT I'M BACK!!!!!  YAHOO!!!!!!!!!)

   --Ok=
ay, like, once I got back online on my new comp, Yanshosh gave me a quick r=
ecap of what was happening, so if I miss something, forgive me.  When I got=
 back, I had 1200 something emails!--

::Dollen/Skulletron/Dark Lavacons/Ha=
kibuscon/Wheeljack::
::Decadel/Hell Drak/Necromancer/Sickle/The Elements:::=
:::

           Dollen looked around the area of the old base.  It was demo=
lished, totally.  He looked at GoldenEye.

         "I think we should retu=
rn to base, love," He said to her.

         But, after he spoke to her, Go=
ldenEye started to change(I'm not moding).  Suddenly, everything turned dar=
k.  GoldenEye was now a giant eagle!!!!!!!!  

         "AHH!!!!  WHAT'S HA=
PPENING!!!!!" Dollen screamed, as giant eagle GoldenEye swooped down at him=
.

         He dove away from GoldenEye.  But then, the giant GoldenEye eag=
les multiplied, and they were all around him.

         They all went divin=
g towards him in the center, when just as he was at the tip of each of thei=
r beaks, everything suddenly turned back to normal.

           "AHHHH!!!!!=
!!!!" Dollen screamed, as he sat up, and found himself on the ground.

    =
      He looked around.

        It was a vision.....Or rather a bad dream.=

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
            Skulletron dropped=
 down to the ground.  He couldn't take the pain much longer.  Well, he coul=
d take it, but his body couldn't.  Mechfluid continued to leak all over fro=
m his many wounds.

            "ERGH!!!!!!!!  I'LL CRUSH YOU!!!" Skulletro=
n screamed at Torca, clenching a fist.

          Skulletron jumped up, and=
 pulled out his seeker missile gun.

         "SAY GOODBYE!!!!!" Skulletron=
 yelled as he fired at Torca.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  =
            Dark Lavatron watched as the Mafia were being demolished.

    =
         The job was done here.

           Dark Lavatron laughed one evil =
laugh, and then split back up into the Dark Lavacons.

            Astral o=
pened his com to Zardus.

          "We're heading back to base, Zardus!" H=
e said.

         Astral and Fenox flew off towards the Alliance base, and =
the others followed behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    =
       Hakibuscon continued walking through endless land.  He was getting n=
owhere fast.  After another hour of travelling, Hakibuscon came across some=
body flying in the air.  And in the distance, the Alliance base.

         =
 Hakibuscon could tell that this flyingbot didn't know where he was going.
=

      And just then, Hakibuscon spotted another bot, firing at the flying =
bot.

         This could be loads fun.

          Hakibuscon snickered.

 =
        He transformed to snake mode, and slithered around the area.  After=
 going around, he transformed again.

         Straight ahead, was the land=
 bot.

         Hakibuscon could now strike him from behind, but he decided=
 to use his bot identifier system to know the bot's name first.

         B=
urning Hammer.

       Hakibuscon came right behind Burning Hammer, ever so=
 quietly.

       Hakibuscon tapped Burning Hammer on the shoulder.

      =
   "Wanna play?" Hakibuscon said as he quickly slashed at Burning Hammer wi=
th an energon blade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           =
 Wheeljack sat at his desk, tinkering with a stop watch.  He had a box of g=
unpowder beside him, and other boxes with who-knows-what inside them.

    =
        "I hope this special grenade of mine could help my comrades on the =
battlefield someday," He mumbled to himself, while working away at stuff.
~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Decadel decided to fi=
nally take charge, and get another bot or two on his side.

            He =
grabbed Hell Drak out of her cell.

          "You can help out too, beauti=
ful," He said.

        Decadel grabbed a little worm thing, and threw it a=
t Hell Drak.

          The worm bored inside her, and then she changed col=
or from red and silver to purple and black.  Decadel laughed, and took Hell=
 Drak to one of his underground CR Chambers.

        After 15 minutes, she=
 came out of the CR Chamber, standing on both feet, at perfect condition.

=
           But one thing was different.  Yes..........She was now one of De=
cadel's slaves!!!  Decadel was her leader!  It was the worm that Decadel us=
ed.  Decadel perfected these worms himself.  He uses them to take over bots=
, and make them 100%(Ok, 102% for the sake of the new 102 Dalmations movie)=
 loyal to him.  

          "We're ready to go now, beautiful," Decadel nod=
ded to her.

         Soon, Hell Drak was up in the air as a flying dragon,=
 with Decadel on her back.

          Time passed, and they spotted some Pr=
edacons.

        "Stupid Predacons, you will bow down before me!!!!!" Deca=
del laughed out evilly.

          Hell Drak swooped over the group of Pred=
acons.

         Heh.  It was Blackarachnia and friends.

         Hell Dra=
k landed by the Predacons, making a slight earthquake.

         Decadel di=
d a very athletic flip off of Hell Drak's head.  While in the air, he threw=
 one of his worms at Tarantulas, and then transformed into worm mode, and t=
unneled into the ground as soon as he hit it.

       He popped up behind e=
verybody, and started firing his flamethrowers at them.

          Hell Dra=
k transformed into robot mode, and fired two lazer disks at Blackarachnia, =
and two lazer disks at Quickstrike.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
           Necromancer had been flying around for a long time now, an=
d still no sign of Hell Drak anywhere.

          "That worm scum looked li=
ke a Predacon," He said to himself.

         Necromancer was desperate to =
find Hell Drak.

         He opened his com back to the CF.

        "I'm a=
dvancing towards Predacon territory, in search of a captured Maximal," He s=
aid.

         He flew off faster, towards Egypt.

        "A captured Maxi=
mal......My sister," He said to himself.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~
         Sickle floated away from the Alliance base.  He wanted t=
o search around the Earth more.

        He shaped his shadowy self into a =
small missile, and floated off as fast as a missile, towards somewhere.
~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           The plant base was stil=
l growing.  Now, a plant barracks had just fully grown, and a plant resourc=
e storage system was partially grown.

           The small base had 4 work=
ers now.  

           Ringalish=E9
